user.title: Select Adjustable Bed
user.description: Select a discovered bed or enter manually.

bluetooth_confirm.title: Confirm Adjustable Bed
bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

data_description.bed_type: Auto-detected bed type. Change if detection was incorrect.
data_description.motor_count: 2 motors: back and legs. 3 motors: adds head. 4 motors: adds feet.
data_description.disable_angle_sensing: When enabled, position sensors and position controls are disabled but the physical remote will continue working. Uncheck to enable position sliders for beds that support them.
data_description.preferred_adapter: Select a specific Bluetooth adapter or proxy, or let Home Assistant choose automatically.
data_description.protocol_variant: Some beds have multiple protocol variants. Auto-detect usually works, but you can override if needed.
data_description.richmat_remote: Select the Richmat remote code (use auto if unsure).
data_description.motor_pulse_count: Number of command pulses sent for motor movement (1-100). Higher = longer movement.
data_description.motor_pulse_delay_ms: Delay between command pulses in milliseconds (10-500). Lower = smoother movement.
data_description.disconnect_after_command: Disconnect from the bed immediately after each command to free up the BLE connection for the physical remote. Recommended for beds that only allow one connection at a time.
data_description.idle_disconnect_seconds: How many seconds to wait before automatically disconnecting when idle (10-300). Lower values free up the connection faster for the physical remote, higher values reduce reconnection overhead.
data_description.octo_pin: PIN code for Octo bed authentication. Required to maintain connection. Leave empty if your bed doesn't require a PIN.

diagnostic.title: Diagnostic Mode - Select Device
diagnostic.description: Select any BLE device to add for diagnostic capture. This allows you to run BLE diagnostics on unsupported devices to help add support for new bed models.

diagnostic_confirm.title: Confirm Diagnostic Device
diagnostic_confirm.description:
Add {name} ({address}) as a diagnostic device?

No motor controls will be available - this device is only for running BLE diagnostics.

diagnostic_manual.title: Diagnostic Mode - Manual Entry
diagnostic_manual.description: Enter the Bluetooth MAC address of the device you want to diagnose.
